title: No popup menu in Java editor ruler (Photon)
description: When using Photon, there is a bug where the popup menu does not appear in the Java editor ruler.
OB: When I open a Java editor in Photon and right-click on the left vertical ruler, no popup menu appears.
EB: The expected behavior is that a menu should appear, allowing me to add breakpoints, marks, etc.
SR: To reproduce this issue: 1) Open a Java editor in Photon. 2) Right-click on the left vertical ruler. The popup menu should appear, but it does not.
